document.full_text: nintendo has announced it will launch the lauded adventure game the legend of zelda: ocarina of time for the 3ds on june 19.
document.title: 'legend of zelda: ocarina of time' hits 3ds on june 19
lines_and_colors: nintendo has announced it will launch the lauded adventure game the legend of zelda: ocarina of time for the 3ds on june 19.
